messages.message: Hey team, wanted to know where is the configuration for running python test on PR creation and how I can update it.

not 100% sure but looking at `.github/workflows/pyunit-test.yml` it seems to use mapping file `shared-utils/test-utils/src/test-cmds-py-unit.json` to decide which test command to run.
however didn't get how it uses `./.github/workflows/unit-test-template.yml` which is all commented.
This is not the one, `image-scanner`  is not present in the configuration

A .json file is generated that matches the structure of test-cmds-py-unit.json with only the python modules that are touched as part of the PR. The script that does this is: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/src/py/run_tests_for_affected_code.py. The generated json is run by https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/test-utils/src/runtest/runtest.go
What are you trying to do @Parvez?
